responses.rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective. 'big' modifies 'outbreak' (a noun), not a risk-adjective.
The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective. 'really' modifies 'need', not a risk-adjective.
